name: Mankey
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment, then thrashing away the next.

abilities.name: Peek
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at one of the following: the top card of either player’s deck, a random card from your opponent’s hand, or one of either player’s Prizes. This power can’t be used if Mankey is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
